events.comment: At The Beginning Of The Scene Setup scene variable (VehicleSpeed = 300) and display on game screen and hide Acceleration Pedal, Break Pedal.

events.name: Adding Wheel Joints At The Beginning Of The Scene

events.comment: Vehicle Physics ( Adding wheel joint between tyres and vehicle )
Center the camera on vehicle object and Setup position buttons relative to scene width

events.name: Keys and Touch Controls for Desktop And Mobile device

events.comment: Keys and Touch Controls
Keys Controls for desktop device
Touch Controls for mobile device
On Hover Keys Button
On Hover Touch Button

events.name: Condition Check for VehicleSpeed variable 1000 value

events.comment:
Condition check : 
------------------------------------------------------------------
If VehicleSpeed=(570) is less than 1000. --> It will run the action.
------------------------------------------------------------------
If VehicleSpeed=(1000) is greater than 1000. Condition fails and will stop any other action inside this if condition.
VehicleSpeed incremented by +20 whenever you press the button

events.name: Condition Check for VehicleSpeed variable 0 value

events.comment:
Condition check : 
------------------------------------------------------------------
If VehicleSpeed=(90) is greater than 0. --> It will run the action.
------------------------------------------------------------------
If VehicleSpeed=(0) is less than 0. Condition fails and will stop any other action inside this if condition.
VehicleSpeed decreased by -20 whenever you press the button

events.name: Start and stop Vehicle Movement (or) Enable the wheel joint motor and disable the wheel joint motor

events.comment: Enable the wheel joint motor, torque = 1 and motor speed = Variable(VehicleSpeed)

Enable the wheel joint motor
The amount of torque the joint can apply to the wheel motor (torque = 1)
Wheel joint motor speed (speed = Variable(VehicleSpeed))
Stop Vehicle Movement (or) Disable the wheel joint motor, Motor speed = 0

Wheel joint motor
Wheel joint motor speed (speed =0)

events.name: Acceleration and Break Pedal Handle Input (Touch Controls)

events.comment:
Condition check : 
------------------------------------------------------------------
If ControlSelection=(2) is equal to 2. --> It will run the action (Vehicle Forward or Backward)
Vehicle Forward

Enable the wheel joint motor
The amount of torque the joint can apply to the wheel motor (torque = 1)
Wheel joint motor speed (speed = Variable(VehicleSpeed))
Disable the wheel joint motor
Vehicle Backward

Enable the wheel joint motor
The amount of torque the joint can apply to the wheel motor (torque = 1)
Wheel joint motor speed (speed = Variable(VehicleSpeed)*-1)
Disable the wheel joint motor

events.name: Acceleration and Break Pedal Handle Input (Keys Controls)

events.comment:
Condition check : 
------------------------------------------------------------------
If ControlSelection=(1) is equal to 1. --> It will run the action (Vehicle Forward or Backward)

Enable the wheel joint motor
The amount of torque the joint can apply to the wheel motor (torque = 1)
Wheel joint motor speed (speed = Variable(VehicleSpeed))
Disable the wheel joint motor

Enable the wheel joint motor
The amount of torque the joint can apply to the wheel motor (torque = 1)
Wheel joint motor speed (speed = Variable(VehicleSpeed)*-1)
Disable the wheel joint motor
Reset the game scene if we press ResetButton
Collision happen, then restart the game scene

eventsFunctionsExtensions.author: 4ian
eventsFunctionsExtensions.description: Behaviors to animate Tiled Sprite objects in the background, following the camera with a parallax effect.
eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: Parallax
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: Behaviors to animate Tiled Sprite objects in the background, following the camera with a parallax effect.

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Move the image of a Tiled Sprite to follow the camera horizontally with a parallax effect. After adding this to an object, put the object on a layer that is not moving, behind the layer that is followed (for example, a layer called "Background").
eventsBasedBehaviors.fullName: Horizontal Parallax for a Tiled Sprite
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: HorizontalTiledSpriteParallax

propertyDescriptors.label: Parallax factor (speed for the parallax, usually between 0 and 1)
propertyDescriptors.name: ParallaxFactor

propertyDescriptors.label: Layer to be followed (leave empty for the base layer)
propertyDescriptors.name: FollowedLayer

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Move the image of a Tiled Sprite to follow the camera vertically with a parallax effect. After adding this to an object, put the object on a layer that is not moving, behind the layer that is followed (for example, a layer called "Background").
eventsBasedBehaviors.fullName: Vertical Parallax for a Tiled Sprite
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: VerticalTiledSpriteParallax

propertyDescriptors.label: Parallax factor (speed for the parallax, usually between 0 and 1)
propertyDescriptors.name: ParallaxFactor

propertyDescriptors.label: Layer to be followed (leave empty for the base layer)
propertyDescriptors.name: FollowedLayer
